name: component-viewer
description: A placeholder component to view other components in isolation.

componentViewerTabTitleLeft.title: Left tab title
componentViewerTabTitleLeft.description: The title to display at the first tab of the component viewer.

componentViewerTabTitleRight.title: Right tab title
componentViewerTabTitleRight.description: The title to display at the second tab of the component viewer.

componentViewerStorybookPreview.title: Storybook Preview Iframe URL
componentViewerStorybookPreview.description: The URL of the Storybook preview iframe to display in the right tab.

componentViewerCodeBlock.title: Storybook Code Block
componentViewerCodeBlock.description: The code block to display in the right tab.

componentViewerFigmaUrl.title: Figma external URL
componentViewerFigmaUrl.description: Figma project URL to open in a new tab when the Figma icon is clicked.

componentViewerStorybookUrl.title: Storybook external URL
componentViewerStorybookUrl.description: Storybook project URL to open in a new tab when the Storybook icon is clicked.

componentViewerGitHubUrl.title: GitHub external URL
componentViewerGitHubUrl.description: GitHub project URL to open in a new tab when the GitHub icon is clicked.

componentViewerNewTab.title: Open Storybook component in a new tab
componentViewerNewTab.description: Storybook preview iframe will open in a new tab when the Storybook tab is clicked.
